title: Ticket #5142: HTCondor 8.3.5+ breaks OSG's HTCondor CE on RHEL5
description: Since HTCondor version 8.3.5, job submission fails for HTCondor CE on RHEL 5 systems.
remarks:
2015-Jul-09 10:11:23 by blin:
This error is intermittent (though frequent), when we have tried to run our test suite against HTCondor 8.3.5+. This link contains a comment with more detail and some CollectorLog snippets that seem to indicate that there are issues reading a ClassAd somewhere:

https://jira.opensciencegrid.org/browse/SOFTWARE-1921?focusedCommentId=330484&page=com.atlassian.jira.plugin.system.issuetabpanels:comment-tabpanel#comment-330484

I can provide full D_FULLDEBUG logs if necessary.

2015-Jul-15 12:42:07 by blin:
I've attached the D_FULLDEBUG log tarball

2015-Jul-15 16:56:35 by jfrey:
Can you post the configuration files used in the failure case?

It appears the failures are occurring when the collector attempts to make a TCP connection to itself via the shared port daemon.

2015-Jul-16 11:57:07 by blin:
I've attached the config val dump. If you'd like the files themselves, they're easy to reconstruct and I could grab them for you.

2015-Aug-07 14:45:05 by jfrey:
I've looked at the supplied log files and can't diagnose the problem. There are some timeouts in the collector and schedd logs, probably caused by #5185. But I can't tell if that's causing condor_submit to fail. And I don't see anything that would explain why Rhel5 would be any different than Rhel6 or Rhel7.

Some additional information would be very useful:

  • How exactly is condor_submit failing? What does it print? Does it block for a while before indicating failure?
  • Timestamps for when condor_submit ran to match up with times in the logs of the associated daemons.
  • Is condor_submit the only tool that fails? What about condor_q or condor_status run at around the same time?

2015-Aug-24 17:47:14 by tim:
Since OSG is no longer build HTCondor 8.3 for RHEL 5 and we are dropping EL 5 support, we will abandon this ticket.
attachments:
• condor-ce.tar.gz 172542 bytes added by blin on 2015-Jul-15 17:41:42 UTC.
    HTCondor CE D_FULLDEBUG logs
  • test_config_dump 41025 bytes added by blin on 2015-Jul-16 16:55:45 UTC.
    Output of `condor_ce_config_val -dump`
creator: tim
